title: Does Zoom kick you off after 40 minutes? - Quora

response.answer_text: In short, the answer is yes and no. Zoom has four service plans: basic, pro, business, and enterprise.Basic is the free option that supports personal meetings. There’s no limit to how many meetings you can hold with the basic plan, but according to Zoom, all meetings hosted with this plan are limited to forty minutes. The pro plan, on the other hand, has meetings that can last up to twenty-four hours.

If you are communicating with one other computer there is not time limit. If you are meeting with three or more computers, at 30-minutes a 10-minute warning will appear and at 40-minutes, you will be cut off. However, if you are a paid subscriber, you can have a meeting without a time limit and meetings with even hundreds of computers depending on what tier you purchase.
